{
  "Allegations" : "6/07; CLIENT STATES WHEN HE ORIGINALLY INVESTED WITH THE FA, HE WANTED TO PURCHASE \"BIOTECH STOCKS\" AND INSTEAD THE FA PURCHASED CITIGROUP, MDU AND RESOURCES GROUP WHICH CONTINUOUSLY DROPPED IN VALUE.  CLIENT STATES WHEN HE REQUESTED FUNDS FROM THE ACCOUNT, THE FA WOULD BECOME UPSET.  CLIENT STATES HE WAS FREQUENTLY UNABLE TO CONTACT THE FA.  CLIENT STATES HE FEELS \"SWINDLED\" AS THE FA WOULD NEVER TELL HIM WHAT HE HAD PURCHASED.  CLIENT ALSO MAKES REFERENCE TO FUNDS THAT WERE WRONGFULLY SURRENDERED TO THE STATE OF FLORIDA.  CLIENT STATES HE REQUESTED THE ACCOUNT BE CHANGED ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS AND THE FA WOULD NOT FOLLOW HIS INSTRUCTIONS.  CLIENT DOES NOT MAKE A SPECIFIC CLAIM; HOWEVER, THE LOSSES IN THE ACCOUNT EXCEED $5,000.",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$5,000.00",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "ACCORDING TO THE FA, HE AND THE CLIENT DID DISCUSS \"BIO-TECH\" STOCKS; HOWEVER, AFTER THEY REVIEWED THE ASSOCIATED RISKS AS WELL AS THE CLIENTS INVESTMENT OBJECTIVES, THE CLIENT AGREED OTHER INVESTMENTS MIGHT BE THE BEST ALTERNATIVE FOR HIM.  THE FA HAS STATED ALL TRANSACTIONS COMPLETED IN THE ACCOUNT WERE PLACED AT THE CLIENT'S DIRECTION AND WITH HIS AUTHORIZATION.  ACCORDING TO OUR RECORDS, THERE WERE SOME STOCKS PURCHASES (C, MDU) MADE IN THE JOINT REGISTRATION ACCOUNT ON JULY 5, 2007.  THE FA HAS INDICATED THE CLIENT BEGAN MAKING FREQUENT CALLS TO HIS OFFICE REQUESTING FUNDS FROM THE ACCOUNT TO COVER VARIOUS EXPENSES.  THE FA HAS INDICATED, EACH TIME A WITHDRAWAL REQUEST WAS MADE HE REMINDED THE CLIENT OF HIS LONG TERM INVESMENT HORIZON AND THAT, AT THE TIME THE INVESTMENTS WERE MADE, THE CLIENT HAD ASSURED HIM HE HAD ASSETS ELSEWHERE THAT COULD BE USED TO MEET UNEXPECTED EXPENSES.  THE FA HAS INDICATED THE CLIENTS CALLS WERE RETURNED IN A PROMPT, PROFESSIONAL MANNER.  THE CLIENT DID CONTACT THE FA ABOUT TRANSFERRING ASSETS TO ANOTHER AND THE FA SUGGESTED THAT THE CLIENT CONSULT WITH HIS TAX PROFESSIONAL RELATED TO THE POTENTIAL TAX CONSEQUENCES ASSOCIATED WITH TRANSFERRING OWNERSHIP OF ASSETS.  OUR RECORDS REFLECT THE ASSETS IN THE JOINT REGISTRATION ACCOUNT WERE TRANSFERRED TO A SINGLE ACCOUNT REGISTERED IN YOUR NAME ON OCTOBER 1, 2007.  THE ACCOUNT WAS SUBSEQUENTLY \"FROZEN\" AND LIQUIDATED PURSUANT TO AN ORDER RECEIVED FROM THE FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.  AT THE TIME OF EACH BUY/SELL COMPLETED IN THE ACCOUNT, YOU WOULD HAVE RECEIVED TRADE CONFIRMATIONS AS WELL AS THE APPROPRIATE PROSPECTUSES FOR THE MUTUAL FUND PURCHASES.  IN ADDITION, YOU RECEIVED ACCOUNT STATEMENTS WHICH PROVIDE INFORMATION REGARDING THE INVESTMENTS HELD IN THE ACCOUNT AS WELL AS REFLECTING ACCOUNT ACTIVITY.  CLAIM DENIED."
}
